next_window: Watch for a potential retest of the Pivot R1 at 147.7207, which could extend to 147.8250 if USD strength persists.
summary: Given the stability in the DXY and its close proximity to the Pivot R1, combined with a narrow trading range in USD/JPY, a long position is favored. DXY strength supports USD/JPY longs, suggesting upward momentum may continue.
